meanings.definition: Occurring, awarded, or appearing after the death of the originator.
meanings.sent1: The posthumously published book became a bestseller.
meanings.sent2: The family received the posthumously awarded medal with pride.
meanings.sent3: The posthumously discovered letter revealed a surprising secret.
meanings.sent4: Her legacy lived on posthumously through her impactful work.
meanings.sent5: The posthumously released album touched the hearts of many.

meanings.definition: Involving, relating to, or characteristic of a deceased person.
meanings.sent1: The posthumously written biography shed light on his life.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed posthumously created artworks.
meanings.sent3: The posthumously found diary contained intriguing stories.
meanings.sent4: His posthumously revealed will surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The posthumously organized tribute honored his memory.
